TopicTitle: Oh, I was supposed to say Hi. So Hello

Articles.Content: Apparently I was supposed to say Hi. Hello, I guess. Let's see, I've been playing KSP for a little under 5 months with around 200ish hours. In that time I've gone interplanetary once, landed on the moon maybe 5 times and docked twice with 2 identical craft. So yeah, I have a lot to learn and a lot to do.

And I'm supposed to say welcome. So welcome.

I went interplanetary once. With my Minmus mission

If you've got any questions about anything, you've just joined one of the best teaching and learning communities out there. Happy flying!

Hi there,

I have joined this forum late in my pre 1.0 career, and its real fun. When i need a laugh i come here and i allways find one or some more .

Happy landings, greetings
